Events that occurred on 24 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1882 - Eric RÃ¼cker Eddison is born
1904 - Actor John Wyse is born.
1917 - Actor John Justin is born.
1942 - Actor Billy Connolly is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 90.
1948 - Artist John Alvin is born.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 194b.
1959 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 221.
1964 - Robert Graves, Oxford's Professor of Poetry, introduces J.R.R. Tolkien to Ava Gardner. They had never heard of one another, and both did not know why the other was famous.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Harry C. Bauer.
2002 - Ring*Con 2002 in Bonn, Germany.
2016 - Laughter in Middle-earth is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
